title: Patch 5.1 You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
body:
Finally got a ranked game going and now I'm stuck with that error 
_"Patch 5.1 You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."
Can't even connect back to the game like I normally would after getting that error, it would be kinda shitty if I got a "leave" for that and a loss of IP due to unstable server connections.
Anyone else experiencing it?

replies.body:
Many people are experiencing disconnections and lag spikes. It also seems like "Loss Prevented" has not been enabled.

Best option is to avoid playing match-made games for the moment.
